name: Expertise in Daysword Crafting
description:
Use this expertise to craft a second-tier precursor.
<c=@flavor>Most informative.<c>

name: Perfected Longbow
description: Salvage this weapon to receive its spirit, needed to craft the next tier of this legendary precursor.

name: Dawn Experiment
description: Salvage this weapon to receive its spirit, needed to craft the next tier of this legendary precursor.

name: Shard of Glory
description: Rewarded through PvP reward tracks and PvP dailies.

name: Oogooth Friendship Bracelet
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Mini Kensho
description: Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.

name: Recipe: Charged Ambrite Orichalcum Earring
description: A recipe to make a Charged Ambrite Orichalcum Earring.

name: Power of the Ley Lines
description: Double-click to combine the Magic of the Elder Dragons, Power of the Ley Lines, Energy from the Mists, and a Vision Crystal to create the Cosmic Power.

name: Recipe: Ruka's Breastplate
description: A recipe to make an ascended heavy coat with Wanderer's (+Power, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Toughness) stats.

name: Box of Recipes: Rage (First Tier)
description: Unlocks all recipes needed to craft Rage (First Tier).

name: Oiled Ancient Torch Handle
description: Used to craft Torches.

name: Sheet of Fine Paper
description: Crafted from wood pulp and cloth. Used to make scrolls and books.

name: Confetti Pouch
description: Double-click to equip a trickster's bouquet.

name: Recipe: Maklain's Tassets
description: A recipe to make ascended heavy leggings with Minstrel's (+Toughness, +Healing, +Concentration, and +Vitality) stats.

name: Dragon Statue
description: Used to craft Rodgort's Flame.

name: Recipe: Viper's Pearl Trident
description: A recipe to make a Viper's Pearl Trident.

name: Wyvern Cache
description: Double-click to gain champion bags, dragonite ore, empyreal fragments, airship parts, a Pact crowbar, a Reclaimed weapon, and other gear.

name: Oiled Orichalcum Warhorn Mouthpiece
description: Used to craft Warhorns.

name: Recipe: Exalted Short-Bow Core
description: Used to craft Auric weapons.

name: Tenebrous Crystal
description: Created by ore synthesizers in Gilded Hollow. Used to craft guild weapons and armor.

name: Recipe: Commander's Pearl Conch
description: A recipe to make a Commander's Pearl Conch.

name: Mini Castor
description: Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.

name: Giant Mushroom Spore
description: Used in decoration crafting. Can be found when harvesting sawgill mushrooms.

name: Recipe: Ossa's Trident
description: A recipe to make an ascended trident with Crusader (+Power, +Toughness, +Ferocity, and +Healing) stats.

name: Ever-Burning Fuel
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Thesis on Studied Strength

details.description:
Gain 100 Power When Health above 90%
+10% Experience from Kills

description: Thesis: Double-click to set out a tome to share with anyone in the area. Stays active for 5 minutes.

name: Expertise in Trident Crafting
description:
Use this expertise to craft a second-tier precursor.
<c=@flavor>Most informative.<c>

description: Used in decoration crafting. Can be found when mining ore nodes.

description: Purchased for crystalline at Mordremoth's Vantage in Dragon's Stand after the area has been secured.

name: Frostfang Vol. 3
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Mordrem Rabbit Finisher
description: Summon the Mordrem rabbit to finish off your foes!

description: Contains various items to aid in battle in the mists.

description: A recipe to make an ascended staff with Wanderer's (+Power, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Toughness) stats.

name: Gift of Claws
description: Purchase this recipe from Miyani.

name: Recipe: Viper's Exalted Coat
description: A recipe to make a Viper's Exalted Coat.

name: Fish Carcass
description: Use the partially digested fish carcass to fertilize your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom.

name: Recipe: Beigarth's Metal Breather
description: A recipe to make an ascended heavy breather with Knight (+Toughness, +Power, and +Precision) stats.

description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

description: Used to make scribing kits.

description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

description: A recipe to make an ascended mace with Wanderer's (+Power, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Toughness) stats.

name: Large Bag of Obsidian
description: Contains 10 Obsidian Shards

description: A recipe to make ascended light gloves with Trailblazer's (+Toughness, +Condition Damage, +Expertise, and +Vitality) stats.

name: Chest of Diving
description: Contains the Essence of Diving and recipes for completing Carcharias.

name: Charged Hammer Head
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

description: This jungle bear finisher box contains the jungle bear finisher, dragonite ore, empyreal fragments, obsidian shards, and mystic clovers.

name: Recipe: Minstrel's Pearl Quarterstaff
description: A recipe to make a Minstrel's Pearl Quarterstaff.

bonuses: When executing a shout skill, chill nearby enemies for 1 second (360 radius).

description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

name: Burned Out M-PEC
description: This device no longer functions.

name: Charged Rifle Barrel
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

description: Used to refine decorations.

name: Feather-Lined Pouch
description: Double-click to open.

name: Maguuma Lily
description: Double-click to apply to an item with an unused upgrade slot.

name: Crimson Sunflower
description: <c=@flavor>Such a rare and vibrant bloom.<c>

buff.description: Steal life when interrupting an enemy.

description: Double-click to apply to a weapon.

description: A recipe to make an ascended sword with Vigilant (+Power, +Toughness, +Concentration, and +Expertise) stats.

Contains dragonite ore.

description: Double-click to apply this look to any other staff.

description: Unlocks all recipes needed to craft The Chosen.

name: Mastery Point
description: Earn a Mastery point the first time you reach this tier.

name: Globe
description: Used to craft Storm.

description: Found in the chest after defeating the Inquest Golem Mark II in Mount Maelstrom.

description: A recipe to make ascended light shoulders with Viper's (+Condition Damage, +Power, +Expertise, and +Precision) stats.

name: Hylek Alchemy Apprentice Tome
description: <c=@flavor>An empty notebook for containing your notes on hylek alchemy.<c>

description: Used to craft decorations.

description: Double-click to apply to an unused infusion slot.

name: Sun God's Breath Flask
description: Double-click to equip the Sun God's Breath.

description: Purchased with Fractal Relics from BUY-4373 in Mistlock Observatory.

description: Used to craft insignias, which are used in armor crafting.

description: A recipe to make an ascended medium helm with Vigilant (+Power, +Toughness, +Concentration, and +Expertise) stats.

name: Visage of Melandru
description: Used in statue crafting. Earned at the Temple of Melandru in Orr.

name: Mordrem Wolf Finisher
description: Summon the Mordrem wolf to finish off your foes!

name: The Grove Portal Scroll
description: Double-click to teleport to this city. This item cannot be used while in combat.

name: Simple Finishing Kit
description: Used to craft decorations.

name: Wyvern Broodmother's Cache
description:
Double-click to open.
Contains loot from creatures.
<c=@reminder>Affected by magic-find bonuses.</c>

name: Beigarth's Leather Breather
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the renowned norn smith, Beigarth.</c>

name: Recipe: Exquisite Lily Jewel
description: A recipe to make an Exquisite Lily Jewel. Lily jewelery recipes can be found in Crystallized Caches in Tangled Depths.

name: Recipe: Laranthir's Trident
description: A recipe to make an ascended trident with Vigilant (+Power, +Toughness, +Concentration, and +Expertise) stats.

name: Ruka's Grips
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the Exalted wanderer, Ruka.</c>

name: Perfected Spear
description: Salvage this weapon to receive its spirit, needed to craft the next tier of this legendary precursor.

name: Jungle Grass Seed
description: Used in decoration crafting. Found on jungle plants in Magus Falls.

name: Svaard's Leggings
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the famous mercenary, Grymm Svaard.</c>

name: Ruka's Wristguards
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the Exalted wanderer, Ruka.</c>

name: Occam's Leather Breather
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the renowned Sylvari smith, Occam.</c>

name: Reaper's Greatsword
description: Complete the Dark Harvest collection to unlock.

name: Auric Backplate
description: Earned by completing the Auric Weapons collection.

name: Pact Crowbar
description: Used to open airship cargo in Verdant Brink. Used automatically on airship cargo in the air. <c=@flavor>Cargo can contain airship parts, crafting materials, armor, weapons, and recipes.</c>

name: The Hessdallen Star Fragment
description: Combine the Jotun Star Fragments in the ruins of Leaning Grade in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.

name: Meteorite Ore
description: Gathered from orichalcum nodes. Refine into ingots.

name: Energy Source
description: Used to craft Zap.

name: Recipe: Exquisite Moonstone Jewel

name: Vial of Chak Acid
description: Used to open Crystallized Supply Caches. <c=@flavor>Caches can contain armor, weapons, and recipes.</c>

name: Crusader Intricate Gossamer Insignia
description: Used in the crafting of armor with +Power, +Toughness, +Ferocity, and +Healing.

name: Gift of the Fleet
description: In the Mystic Forge, combine a Gift of the Fleet, a Gift of Tarir, a Gift of the Chak, and a Gift of the Jungle to create a Gift of Maguuma, used in crafting legendary weapons.

name: Mordrem Splinter
description: Found on the vinewrath in the Silverwastes.

description: A recipe to make an ascended greatsword with Crusader (+Power, +Toughness, +Ferocity, and +Healing) stats.

name: Attuned Plague Signet (Infused)

+32 Condition Damage
+18 Power
+18 Precision
+5 Agony Resistance
